name: The Necklace of the Beast
data: It decreases the users strength pitifully.
It decreases the users wisdom poorly.
It increases the users intelligence somewhat.
It increases the users charisma impressively.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration nicely.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'tonal control'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
